title: Can Windows 10 cause high ping?
body: I know this is kinda a stupid question but I recently downloaded Windows 10 (and even tho I didn't have ping problems that day) I was wondering if maybe someone else had ping problems from it?

replies.body: You may need to adjust a few of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still setup in the best way. Check out the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you need a little help getting port forwarding and your DNS setup!
